publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3469# Sandra White: Chinese Healthy Living Centre—That the Parliament congratulates the Chinese Healthy Living Centre in Maryhill, Glasgow, on its continuing success in promoting greater health and wellbeing among the Chinese community; commends its overarching ethos to reduce isolation and increase community building and integration through, among other initiatives, encouraging wider employment for Chinese people beyond the traditional occupational patterns, and hopes that the centre will continue to flourish and benefit all those involved. The member has provided the following Chinese translation: 苏格兰议会对于格拉斯哥华人社康中心，长久以来致力于促进华人居民身心健康，而取得的杰出成就表示诚挚的祝贺。 并对其在消除社区隔阂，促进社区发展与融合，以及突破传统领域广泛促进华人就业等方面，所做出的重大贡献表示赞赏。 苏格兰议会希望华康中心能够将其工作成果进一步发扬光大，从而使得所有华康的参与者都能进一步从中受益。
S3M-3469# Chinese Healthy Living Centre (lodged on 17 February 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Michael Matheson*, Rob Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Jamie McGrigor*, Christina McKelvie*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-3469# Chinese Healthy Living Centre (lodged on 17 February 2009) Bob Doris*, Angela Constance*, Jim Tolson*
S3M-3469# Chinese Healthy Living Centre (lodged on 17 February 2009) Ken Macintosh*
S3M-3469# Chinese Healthy Living Centre (lodged on 17 February 2009) Bill Kidd*
